meta_description: The National Czech & Slovak Museum & Library (NCSML) works to inspire people from every background to connect to Czech and Slovak history and culture through exhibitions and experiences.
hours_text:
###### Parking

The NCSML offers complimentary parking for our guests.

**Heated Parking Garage:** To access our temperature controlled garage, simply pull your car next to the large sensor outside of the garage entrance. The door will open automatically. (Our elevator is accessible from inside the garage.)

**Parking Lot:** We also have a parking lot in front of the building. We’re sure you’ll see this one first — you can’t miss it!

**Bus Parking:** Buses are welcome to park and unload in the roundabout circle drive in the front of the building.
